    • Method Detail

      • edt

        public static void edt​(Runnable runnable)
                throws InvocationTargetException,
                       InterruptedException
        Causes the specified Runnable be executed synchronously on the AWT Event Dispatching Thread. If the current thread is the AWT Event Dispatching Thread the Runnable.run() method is invoked immediately. This method blocks until the specified runnable is finished executing.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the specified Runnable
        Throws:
        InvocationTargetException - if we're interrupted while waiting for the event dispatching thread to finish executing
        InterruptedException - if an exception is thrown while executing
        See Also:
        SwingUtilities.invokeLater(Runnable)
